title: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.
author: Langston Hughes

title: We all have dreams. But in order to make dreams come into reality, it takes an awful lot of determination, dedication, self-discipline, and effort.

title: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.
author: James Dean

title: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
author: Anatole France

author: Edgar Allan Poe

author: Oscar Wilde

title: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real.

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

title: Sleep is the best meditation.
author: Dalai Lama

title: When you cease to dream you cease to live.

title: Youth is a wonderful thing. What a crime to waste it on children.
author: George Bernard Shaw

author: D. H. Lawrence

author: Walter Scott

author: Brian Schweitzer

title: Dreams are a scientific fact.

author: David Bailey

title: I don't design clothes, I design dreams.
author: Ralph Lauren

title: Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.

author: Pope John XXIII

title: Never underestimate the power of dreams and the influence of the human spirit. We are all the same in this notion: The potential for greatness lives within each of us.
author: Wilma Rudolph

title: There are so many dreams that I'd like to follow.

author: Carl Jung

title: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams.
author: Ben Carson

title: Follow your dreams, believe in yourself and don't give up.
author: Rachel Corrie

title: Life without dreams is like a bird with a broken wing - it can't fly.

title: Don't let your dreams be dreams.

author: Edward Kennedy

author: Phillip Sweet

title: Trust in dreams, for in them is hidden the gate to eternity.
author: Khalil Gibran

title: Your dreams are what define your individuality. They have the power to give you wings and make you fly high.
author: P. V. Sindhu

title: Freedom and democracy are dreams you never give up.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

title: Never let life impede on your ability to manifest your dreams. Dig deeper into your dreams and deeper into yourself and believe that anything is possible, and make it happen.
author: Corin Nemec

title: The real hero is always a hero by mistake; he dreams of being an honest coward like everybody else.
author: Umberto Eco

title: I always tell young people to hold on to their dreams. And sometimes you have to stand up for what you think is right even if you have to stand alone.
author: Claudette Colvin

title: When all of your wishes are granted, many of your dreams will be destroyed.
author: Marilyn Manson

title: You control your future, your destiny. What you think about comes about. By recording your dreams and goals on paper, you set in motion the process of becoming the person you most want to be. Put your future in good hands - your own.
author: Mark Victor Hansen

author: Jeremy Irons

title: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

title: Our children are the living messages we send to a future we will ever see... Will we rob them of their destiny? Will we rob them of their dreams? No - we will not do that.
author: Elijah Cummings

title: I couldn't find the sports car of my dreams, so I built it myself.
author: Ferdinand Porsche

title: We become not a melting pot but a beautiful mosaic. Different people, different beliefs, different yearnings, different hopes, different dreams.
author: Jimmy Carter

title: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
author: Thomas Jefferson

title: Ocean is more ancient than the mountains, and freighted with the memories and the dreams of Time.
author: H. P. Lovecraft

title: Dreams are illustrations from the book your soul is writing about you.
author: Marsha Norman

title: An athlete cannot run with money in his pockets. He must run with hope in his heart and dreams in his head.
author: Emil Zatopek

title: I have dreams of becoming a professional pastry chef and having a little bakery - that's how much I love baking. I love to cook in general, but my heart lies in desserts.

title: I am just a girl chasing her dreams and having an amazing adventure.
author: Madeline Stuart

title: Job training empowers people to realize their dreams and improve their lives.
author: Sylvia Mathews Burwell

title: Keep true to the dreams of your youth.
author: Friedrich Schiller

author: Lil Tjay

title: Men are the dreams of a shadow.
author: Pindar

title: Every scientist dreams of doing something that can help the world.
author: Tu Youyou

title: Dreams don't have deadlines. I'm thinking of doing bigger and better things and having more fun with it.
author: LL Cool J

author: Rush Limbaugh

title: Dreams are the seeds of change. Nothing ever grows without a seed, and nothing ever changes without a dream.
author: Debby Boone

title: The human heart has hidden treasures, In secret kept, in silence sealed; The thoughts, the hopes, the dreams, the pleasures, Whose charms were broken if revealed.
author: Charlotte Bronte

title: Sometimes dreams are wiser than waking.
author: Black Elk

title: Follow your dreams. If you have a goal, and you want to achieve it, then work hard and do everything you can to get there, and one day it will come true.

title: Dream lofty dreams, and as you dream, so you shall become. Your vision is the promise of what you shall one day be; your ideal is the prophecy of what you shall at last unveil.

author: Bob Dylan

title: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

title: I feel as though, if you're able to control your dreams, you have more power and control over your mind, like you could reach more areas of your mind. Therefore, I feel like it creates the ability for you to achieve more things in reality.

title: Within our dreams and aspirations we find our opportunities.

title: The percentage you're paying is too high priced While you're living beyond all your means And the man in the suit has just bought a new car From the profit he's made on your dreams.
author: Steve Winwood

title: Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.
author: Henry David Thoreau

title: Go out and chase your dreams no matter how crazy it looks.

title: How blessed are some people, whose lives have no fears, no dreads; to whom sleep is a blessing that comes nightly, and brings nothing but sweet dreams.
author: Bram Stoker

author: James Allen

title: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.
author: Anais Nin

title: The only thing that comes to a sleeping man is dreams.
author: Tupac Shakur

title: Hope lies in dreams, in imagination, and in the courage of those who dare to make dreams into reality.
author: Jonas Salk

title: Dream small dreams. If you make them too big, you get overwhelmed and you don't do anything. If you make small goals and accomplish them, it gives you the confidence to go on to higher goals.
author: John H. Johnson

title: Help others achieve their dreams and you will achieve yours.

title: A horse is the projection of peoples' dreams about themselves - strong, powerful, beautiful - and it has the capability of giving us escape from our mundane existence.
author: Pam Brown

author: James Arthur

title: You can't break my spirit, it's my dreams you take.
author: James Blunt

title: The equal right of all citizens to health, education, work, food, security, culture, science, and wellbeing - that is, the same rights we proclaimed when we began our struggle, in addition to those which emerge from our dreams of justice and equality for all inhabitants of our world - is what I wish for all.

title: It is better to risk starving to death then surrender. If you give up on your dreams, what's left?
author: Jim Carrey

title: I would encourage you to set really high goals. Set goals that, when you set them, you think they're impossible. But then every day you can work towards them, and anything is possible, so keep working hard and follow your dreams.

title: I really had a lot of dreams when I was a kid, and I think a great deal of that grew out of the fact that I had a chance to read a lot.

title: Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.

title: You have to know your identity. It's the biggest thing in wanting to pursue creative dreams.

title: Believe in love. Believe in magic. Hell, believe in Santa Clause. Believe in others. Believe in yourself. Believe in your dreams. If you don't, who will?

title: What is life? A madness. What is life? An illusion, a shadow, a story. And the greatest good is little enough; for all life is a dream, and dreams themselves are only dreams.

title: No matter where you are from, no matter what your background is, no matter what your socioeconomic status is, every person can achieve his or her dreams.

title: If you dream of becoming an eagle, you follow your dreams and not the words of a bunch of chickens.

title: Take what you can from your dreams, make them as real as anything.

title: Believe in yourself, go after your dreams, and don't let anyone put you in a box.
author: Daya

title: There's a lot of blood, sweat, and guts between dreams and success.
author: Bear Bryant

title: Pursue your dreams but have a backup plan.
author: Kane

title: Today I know that there is still work to be done, but along the way my I am achieving my dreams.

title: If dreams are like movies, then memories are films about ghosts.

title: I've always been fascinated by memory and dreams because they are both completely our own. No one else has the same memories. No one has the same dreams.

title: I have dreamed in my life, dreams that have stayed with me ever after, and changed my ideas; they have gone through and through me, like wine through water, and altered the color of my mind.

title: One of the dreams on my wish list is to spend more time in Thailand.

title: To become a great player, you've got to show real dedication and commitment to football, and you've got to be very humble and hard-working. And, above all, you've got to fight to make your dreams come true.
